envSample.name: sheetsAPIKey
envSample.description: API Key to access Google Spreadsheets API as incognito user

envSample.name: BACKEND_URL
envSample.description: Address of the entrypoint of the backend

envSample.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID
envSample.description: The ID for the Google Analytics plugin

envSample.name: NEW_CATALOG
envSample.description: [Feature Flag] Indicates the adoption of the new catalog backend ('true' or 'false')

envSample.name: OPEN_COMPANY_UPDATE_FORMS
envSample.description: [Feature Flag] Indicates whether Company Update forms is open ('true' or 'false')

envSample.name: OPEN_CONEXAO_FORMS
envSample.description: [Feature Flag] Indicates whether Conexao forms is open ('true' or 'false')

envSample.name: BETA_VERSION
envSample.description: [Feature Flag] Indicates whether the current deployment is a beta version ('true' or 'false')

envSample.name: PDI_DATA_SOURCE_URL
envSample.description: The address of the old catalog endpoint for PDI
